transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, Sushil sir.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir, Sumit baat kar raha hu sir main IndiaMART se, kaise hain aap?
Customer: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Sir actually na ek mail receive hua tha aapka ki jo aapki profiles vagera chal rahi thi usme mobile number aur jo email ID hai wo aapke employee the jo chhod gaye hain job unhone apna number update kar rakha hai vahan pe jiski vajah se aap kuch access nahi kar pa rahe ho, right sir?
Customer: Ji, ji.
Executive: Maine abhi unse baat ki thi Vipul naam tha shayad unka. Haan ji. Maine abhi unko same hi cheez boli maine bhai sir agar aap yahan pe Platinum Cables Private Limited aapki firm hai kya? To Sumit bole haan maine sir aapki firm hai ye pakka? Kehla nahi meri nahi hai. Maine phir aapki jo mail ID vagera hai number to sir wo apna hatwa ke unka update karaiye. Sir ka karwao vahan pe. To wo bol rahe hain ki ek baar main bhi apna number hatwa ke unke number pe yahan pe jo unko add karana hai ek baar aapse wo coordinate karne ke liye bol rahe hain ki wo number aapka number pe OTP aayega aapka number vahan pe phir add karwayenge abhi.
Customer: Ji usse kya hoga?
Executive: Ya phir aap mere ko ek haan batao.
Customer: Hum isko sir cancel karwana chahte hain abhi humare ko handle karne ke liye koi hai nahi iska.
Executive: Sir ji dekho cancel karna koi solution nahi hai. Dekho sir cancel actually kya hoga sir dekho band bhi ho jayega wo paisa wapas nahi aayega to aap usse achha hai sir use thoda thoda daily ki ek ek do do enquiry karo sir aapki company ki listing aur visibility bani hui hai.
Customer: IndiaMART mein jab humne package liya tha to unhone kaha tha jab tak use karoge jab bhi use nahi karna chaho aapka paisa utne din ka product aap bech ke refund ho jayega.
Executive: Sir ji ek cheez batao aap aapki jo form humare sath chali hai ye kisne bola pehli cheez to sir dekho aisa hota nahi hai. Dusri cheez reason ye hai ki aapki jo company hai pure services ka aap ja ke IndiaMART pe baithe hue ho jisse company haan jisse listing aur visibility aapki maintain ho rakhi hai Sushil sir. Main to hai na main to bas dekho sir ye hai ki listing hai jo buyer yahan se aapke pass organically aa raha hai wo traffic traffic aapke pass aana shuru hoga sir.
Customer: Aise nahi ho raha.
Executive: Sir kya busy ho gaye aap phir aap?
Customer: Ek minute wo ek alag cheez hai pehle tum mere ko confirm karo sir isme refund policy hai ki nahi aapki?
Executive: Sir dekho aise refund policy nahi hai sir yahan pe.
Customer: To sir mere ko us time jhooth bola gaya.
Executive: Sir aise refund policy nahi hoti main aapko to friendly batao dekho hum aapke product se related dekho business enquiries aapko provide karwane ke liye aur aap use use bhi karoge aur aap jab bhi dekho kyunki aisa nahi hai ki humare pass traffic nahi aa raha aapke product se related.
Customer: Jitni enquiry jaise fix hai itni hum use kar sakte hain.
Executive: Kya keh rahe ho?
Customer: Bas sir jitna use kare utne ka paisa aap kaat lo jitne mahine use kiya humne baki refund kar do.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi sir aisa hota to bilkul aisa hota sir main bilkul aapko karwa deta. Agar aisa hai nahi hai tabhi main aapko wo bol raha hu ki apna number change kara ke aap ise use kijiye cheezon ko leke. Wahan pe mera effort sahi hai. Dekho aap offline vagera bhi to chala hi rahe hain na sir us cheez ko ya nahi chala rahe hain sir Platinum Cables ko?
Customer: Ek company chal rahi hai sir usko dekhne ke liye koi hai nahi sir dekhne ke liye.
Executive: Haan kaise sir? Nahi sir main aapko to friendly batau Sushil sir aap abhi jaise aapne pehle banda rakha tha jo aapka job chhod gaya hai jab tak koi banda nahi aata hai meri team aapko jo bhi tarika hai ek baar aapko pura online demo de payenge jaise bhi aapko apne hisab se daily ka 10 minute ke 15 minute nikalti hai un enquiry pe bhi aap apna connect kar sakte ho jo calls aapke pass aayenge jaise aap offline pe calls calls buyer se baat karte ho calls ko usi tarike se aap calls ko attend kar pana ya jo aapke mail pe enquiry aayegi us enquiry pe aap mail pe revert karna. Jab koi person puchhe aapke pass haan aise karwa lo.
Customer: Ha udhar wala aise karwa lo.
Executive: Haan bilkul sir wo to buyer aayega hi aayega aapke pass teen tarike se aata hai sir ek buylead aap purchase karte ho ek calls aati hai aapke pass aur ek direct enquiry message buyer karta hai aapko.
Customer: Aap mere ko na ek kaam karwa do filhal aap apni jo mail ID hai na info wali us mail ID se aapko jo haan aap apna ek three page ka GST certificate attach karke aur apna to laga hua hai sir GST vagera to sab laga hua company mein.
Executive: Nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi nahi aapne de rakha tha kyunki yahan pe jo aapka primary number primary mail ID dono hi bande ne hata di na primary usme apni laga rakhi hai na to ab aap haan ye to agar aap ye agar aapko Vipul se coordinate ho jaye to Vipul se coordinate karke aap apni dono apna number vahan pe lagwa do OTP wo use deke wo okay kar dega. Agar wo nahi bhi karta hai to apni info wali mail ID se mere ko mail karwa do three page ka GST certificate attach karke ye wala mera number aapka number kar lo sir ye? Sir ka ye mera ye mera number kar lo main bhi aapko apna WhatsApp pe dal de raha hu sir aur ek mail bhi kar de raha hu. Ye ek mail bhi kar de raha hu ki us pe apna likh do ek mail kar do ki sir ye mera number kar do primary ye mera email ID kar dijiye usme three page ka GST certificate attach karke aur apna koi bhi ID aapke pass hai bill ka company ke naam ka bill koi hoga wo mere ko forward karwa do main aage proceed karwa dunga sir changes karwane ke liye aapka.
Customer: Vipul se baat kare agar wo kar dete OTP se to thik hai nahi phir main aapko ye mail dal ke request dal ke.
Executive: Mail ko aap mail karwa dijiyega bilkul sir wo abhi meri aapse baat karne se pehle maine unko hi call kiya tha isliye to wo bole ki main sir se coordinate karke main karwa de raha hu OTP vagera ka.
Customer: Thik hai na.
Executive: Thik hai sir. Thik hai sir aapka number fix kar lo koi dikkat hogi aapko call karunga phir main.
Customer: Koi problem nahi hai sir aap mere ko kar lijiyega main filhal aapko side by side.
Executive: 9 to 6 to main rehta hi hu baki ek mail bhi bhej raha hu aapko mail pe bhi aap revert kar dena mere ko. Thik hai na?
Customer: Thik hai sir.
Executive: Okay sir. Thank you so much sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer wants to cancel the subscription.

- Wants refund for unused subscription period.

- Employee left, changed primary contact details.



Resolution:

- Executive explained cancellation is not a solution.

- Advised to use the subscription.

- Asked to coordinate with Vipul to update details.

- Offered to update details via email.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will send an email with required documents.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, subscription, contact details, cancellation
